text:
I was an extroverted and antagonistic child who was open to new experiences. I was always full of energy and had a good, strong personality. I liked to talk a lot, and was often the life of the party. I was also creative and inventive. I enjoyed making things exciting and coming up with new ideas. I was a good, hard worker and liked to cooperate with others.

I was also conscientious and did things carefully and completely. I made plans and stuck to them. I was helpful and not selfish with others, and was kind and considerate to almost everyone. I was a good listener and often noticed other people’s weak points.

At the same time, I was neurotic and had a tendency to worry a lot. I was also sometimes moody and could be cold and distant with others. I was not always easy-going and could be tense at times. I also had trouble paying attention and could be kind of careless.

I was not shy, but I was not always outgoing either. I could be quiet, and I trusted people easily. I was not particularly organized, but I was a good, active imaginer and enjoyed artistic and creative experiences. 

I was also lazy at times, and did not always have the energy I wanted to have. I was, however, able to stay calm in difficult situations. I also rarely got upset easily and was usually steady. 

My childhood was full of new experiences and exciting adventures. I loved exploring my surroundings and learning new things. I was constantly searching for new ways of doing things and coming up with creative solutions. I was curious about the world and wanted to find out as much as I could. 

I enjoyed playing music and reading books. I also loved playing with ideas and thinking about the world around me. I was never afraid to ask questions and was always eager to learn. 

I was never afraid to speak my mind and was not afraid to disagree with others. I was also never afraid to stand up for what I believed in. I was always looking for ways to make the world better and was not afraid to take risks. 

Overall, I was an extroverted, antagonistic, conscientious, neurotic, and open to experience child. I enjoyed being around people and was always looking for new experiences and adventures. I was also a good listener and liked to think and play with ideas. I was creative and inventive and was never afraid to speak my mind.
prompt:

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.
